divs: sighting detailsok here's the deal.i work as a security gaurd for trion security.i'm contracted to an office building couple doors down.3701 pender dr fairfax,va 22030.i do the 10pm to 6am shift sunday and monday night.drive down the street all the way to the end,there is a cul de sac.on the right hand side is 3701 and you will see a 2 level parking garage.anyways around 2am i noticed an object making passes over my site.2 solid non-blinking lights with a red oscillating light in the middle.no wings and no sound.dead quiet.upon the 3rd pass\fly by,i walked up on the parking garage and began signaling the object with my flashlight.this,no doubt,got it's attention.really got it's attention.it made additional passes nearby,slowly,in an observation manner.each time flying over head coming from different directions but the focus was where i was standing.on the 8th,9th,and 10th pass,it got really close.this is when i became nervous.this also gave me a chance to observe the object in great detail.the features were like what i previously stated also had no wings and when it turned it did not bank like a plane.it would turn in a sort of horizonatal arc.again no sound.on the 9th pass the altitude was very low,it went out over the nearby treetops and made a u turn.it came back around for the final pass,slowly as i waved my flashlight around,making gestures with the light.it then went off over the treestops.this went on for 2 1\2 hours.i am going back out there either tommorow night or my next shift.i will bring stronger flashlight and recording equipment for proof.i may bring a witness as well.this location has a lot of activity(i had seen something on the night previous to that conncering to large objects around 3am but i will save that for another time)the goal here is to coax it even closer overhead to get a good shot maybe even try to get it to land,on top of the garage.sounds crazy,i know but it is what it is.if you guys are interested in this experiment,email me back or come out here.we have plenty of activity.i will say though flashing these things with high powered flash lights,attract them out of curiousity being that most people don't do that ha ha.so that's it.laters.
trends: There have been 14 other sightings in Fairfax
There were no other sightings in Fairfax on or around June 17th 2008
Summary: Object made 10 fly by passes over parking garage when I signaled it with flashlight.
